text: Happy Friday! Reviewing different SEO tools and would recommendations/opinions on your favorites. Currently looking at SEMRush + Ahrefs.

I dont recall the usage i had on AHrefs but I know I used SEMRush a lot back at my old agency as well as Moz. What is it you are looking to view with the SEO Tools?

We do have a <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/cos-general/how-can-i-optimize-my-pages-for-seo|SEO Recommendations tool> in our app that is powered by Google Lighthouse and identifies issues as well.
